name: Mentum
headline: AI-Powered Assistant for Procurement and Strategic Sourcing
description: Mentum helps procurement and supply chain teams streamline strategic sourcing with AI, transforming unstructured data into actionable insights for faster decisions and cost savings. Backed by Google’s Gradient Ventures and Y Combinator, we serve industries like CPG, energy, automotive, and aerospace.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:supply-chain; industry:procurement; location:san-francisco-bay-area

## Streamline Every Step of Your Sourcing Process.
See how our customers use Mentum to increase supply chain visibility and free their buyers to focus on strategic work.
CompareGenerateSourceTrack
### Extract and Compare Supplier Quotes with Ease
1Automatically pull relevant data from supplier emails and attachments—no more manual sorting.
2Conduct AI-powered, apple-to-apple comparisons of quotes or bids- no matter the formats suppliers send their information.
3Cite sources for full transparency, showing exactly which documents and data informed your analysis.
4Manage complex communications across R&D, procurement, finance, and suppliers across multiple email threads.
![Extract and Compare Supplier Quotes with Ease](http://getmentum.com/assets/rfq-CxastbrA.png)
### Create RFI, RFQ, and RFP Packages in Minutes
1Quickly drag and drop or pull specifications to generate RFQ, RFI, or RFP packages.
2Automatically generate supplier requirements, ensuring you track the right commercial and technical data.
3Standardize what suppliers need to deliver and minimize back-and-forth clarifications.
![Create RFI, RFQ, and RFP Packages in Minutes](http://getmentum.com/assets/compliance-BvCExCmb.png)
### Find the Right Suppliers from Existing Data
1Use historical email communications and ERP records to identify the best suppliers for your needs.
2Leverage AI to surface supplier performance trends, pricing history, and reliability scores.
3Expand your supplier network with recommendations tailored to your past data and project goals.
![Find the Right Suppliers from Existing Data](http://getmentum.com/assets/status-8FTo-HzO.png)
### Monitor Supplier Communication and Maintain Traceability
1Track when suppliers open emails, reply, and how long it takes—streamline follow-ups and boost efficiency.
2Maintain a full audit trail of sourcing activity for compliance and accountability.
3Centralize all sourcing documentation in one place with clear version control.
![Monitor Supplier Communication and Maintain Traceability](http://getmentum.com/assets/integrations-Dk5t350i.png)
## Building blocks for your strategic source-to-pay journey
Leverage AI to expand beyond RFQs to other use cases across your supply chain workflows.
##### Purchase Order Status Tracking
Track POs from issuance to delivery with real-time updates from suppliers and ERP systems. Get instant alerts for delays or changes to ensure on-time delivery.
##### Purchase Order Acknowledgement
Automatically extract and track PO confirmations from supplier emails. Keep complete records for compliance and dispute resolution.
##### Invoice Reconciliation
Automate three-way matching between POs, invoices, and receipts. Quickly spot and resolve discrepancies to prevent payment delays.
##### Project Management
Prioritize critical tasks based on real-time updates from email and ERP systems. Detect and manage issues early to ensure smooth operations.
##### Supplier List Management
Use AI to extract and enrich supplier data from historical communications. Automatically identify potential new suppliers based on your needs.
##### Centralized Requisitions
Streamline approvals by consolidating all requests and updates in one place. Get clear visibility into requisition status and next steps.
## Unify Your Supply Chain Systems and Data. Safely.
  * ###### Seamless Connections
    * Connect to Office 365, Gmail, Google Drive, and more in minutes
    * Sync data with PowerBI and ERPs like NetSuite, SAP, and Dynamics 365
    * Quick setup with zero IT complexity
  * ###### Enterprise-grade security
    * ITAR compliant and SOC II Type 1 certified for aerospace and defense
    * End-to-end encryption exceeding industry standards

## Simplify Sourcing with AI Precision
Mentum streamlines your sourcing process by transforming how your team handles data, ensuring accuracy, and delivering actionable insights effortlessly.
![Email Analysis](http://getmentum.com/assets/emailExtraction-1yORuNX5.png)
#### Uncover Key Insights from Your Team's Inbox
AI automatically identifies relevant emails and attachments, saving you from digging through clutter.
  * 1
Instantly identify emails and attachments critical to your sourcing needs.
  * 2
Filter out irrelevant content to focus on what matters most.
  * 3
Extract and organize key details, making them ready for immediate action.


![Data Structure](http://getmentum.com/assets/structuredData-VY89a4sa.png)
#### Structure Data for Seamless Integration
Transform unstructured data into custom formats that fit your workflow and systems.
  * • Convert emails, PDFs, and spreadsheets into clean, structured formats.
  * • Tailor outputs to match ERP templates or analytics systems.
  * • Minimize errors and maintain consistency across all data points.


#### Verify with Confidence
Keep control with human oversight, ensuring every detail is accurate and traceable.
  * • See exactly where AI sourced each piece of data with clear citations.
  * • Address flagged low-confidence results quickly with AI recommendations.
  * • Maintain an audit trail of changes for accountability and compliance.


![Verification Process](http://getmentum.com/assets/pdfAgent-DmOVYqSi.png)

  * ![/assets/yc-GDPK0_T4.png⟨17⟩]


## Streamline Every Step of Your Sourcing Process.
See how our customers use Mentum to increase supply chain visibility and free their buyers to focus on strategic work.
CompareGenerateSourceTrack
### Extract and Compare Supplier Quotes with Ease
1Automatically pull relevant data from supplier emails and attachments—no more manual sorting.
2Conduct AI-powered, apple-to-apple comparisons of quotes or bids- no matter the formats suppliers send their information.
3Cite sources for full transparency, showing exactly which documents and data informed your analysis.
4Manage complex communications across R&D, procurement, finance, and suppliers across multiple email threads.
![Extract and Compare Supplier Quotes with Ease⟨18⟩]
### Create RFI, RFQ, and RFP Packages in Minutes
1Quickly drag and drop or pull specifications to generate RFQ, RFI, or RFP packages.
2Automatically generate supplier requirements, ensuring you track the right commercial and technical data.
3Standardize what suppliers need to deliver and minimize back-and-forth clarifications.
![Create RFI, RFQ, and RFP Packages in Minutes⟨19⟩]
### Find the Right Suppliers from Existing Data
1Use historical email communications and ERP records to identify the best suppliers for your needs.
2Leverage AI to surface supplier performance trends, pricing history, and reliability scores.
3Expand your supplier network with recommendations tailored to your past data and project goals.
![Find the Right Suppliers from Existing Data⟨20⟩]
### Monitor Supplier Communication and Maintain Traceability
1Track when suppliers open emails, reply, and how long it takes—streamline follow-ups and boost efficiency.
2Maintain a full audit trail of sourcing activity for compliance and accountability.
3Centralize all sourcing documentation in one place with clear version control.
![Monitor Supplier Communication and Maintain Traceability⟨21⟩]
## Building blocks for your strategic source-to-pay journey
Leverage AI to expand beyond RFQs to other use cases across your supply chain workflows.
##### Purchase Order Status Tracking
Track POs from issuance to delivery with real-time updates from suppliers and ERP systems. Get instant alerts for delays or changes to ensure on-time delivery.
##### Purchase Order Acknowledgement
Automatically extract and track PO confirmations from supplier emails. Keep complete records for compliance and dispute resolution.
##### Invoice Reconciliation
Automate three-way matching between POs, invoices, and receipts. Quickly spot and resolve discrepancies to prevent payment delays.
##### Project Management
Prioritize critical tasks based on real-time updates from email and ERP systems. Detect and manage issues early to ensure smooth operations.
##### Supplier List Management
Use AI to extract and enrich supplier data from historical communications. Automatically identify potential new suppliers based on your needs.
##### Centralized Requisitions
Streamline approvals by consolidating all requests and updates in one place. Get clear visibility into requisition status and next steps.
## Unify Your Supply Chain Systems and Data. Safely.
  * ###### Seamless Connections
    * Connect to Office 365, Gmail, Google Drive, and more in minutes
    * Sync data with PowerBI and ERPs like NetSuite, SAP, and Dynamics 365
    * Quick setup with zero IT complexity
  * ###### Enterprise-grade security
    * ITAR compliant and SOC II Type 1 certified for aerospace and defense
    * End-to-end encryption exceeding industry standards

Book a Demo⟨8⟩
![Mentum⟨22⟩]
  * ![teams⟨23⟩]
  * ![netsuite⟨24⟩]
  * ![sap⟨25⟩]
  * ![slack⟨26⟩]
  * ![notion⟨26⟩]
  * ![drive⟨27⟩]
  * ![onedrive⟨28⟩]
  * ![coupa⟨29⟩]


![Curve 1⟨30⟩]
![Curve 2⟨31⟩]
## Simplify Sourcing with AI Precision
Mentum streamlines your sourcing process by transforming how your team handles data, ensuring accuracy, and delivering actionable insights effortlessly.
![Email Analysis⟨32⟩]
#### Uncover Key Insights from Your Team's Inbox
AI automatically identifies relevant emails and attachments, saving you from digging through clutter.
  * 1
Instantly identify emails and attachments critical to your sourcing needs.
  * 2
Filter out irrelevant content to focus on what matters most.
  * 3
Extract and organize key details, making them ready for immediate action.


![Data Structure⟨33⟩]
#### Structure Data for Seamless Integration
Transform unstructured data into custom formats that fit your workflow and systems.
  * • Convert emails, PDFs, and spreadsheets into clean, structured formats.
  * • Tailor outputs to match ERP templates or analytics systems.
  * • Minimize errors and maintain consistency across all data points.


#### Verify with Confidence
Keep control with human oversight, ensuring every detail is accurate and traceable.
  * • See exactly where AI sourced each piece of data with clear citations.
  * • Address flagged low-confidence results quickly with AI recommendations.
  * • Maintain an audit trail of changes for accountability and compliance.


![Verification Process⟨34⟩]
## Powering Supply Chain Efficiency Across Innovative Industries
Discover how Mentum is transforming supply chain operations in diverse sectors:
Consumer Packaged GoodsFood & Beverage • Furniture • Personal Care • Home GoodsLearn more >⟨8⟩EnergyEnergy Generation • Energy StorageLearn more >⟨8⟩AutomotiveElectric Vehicles • Traditional AutomotiveLearn more >⟨8⟩Aerospace and DefenseCommercial Aerospace • Defense Systems • Space TechnologyLearn more >⟨8⟩Healthcare and Life SciencesMedical Devices • Pharmaceuticals • BiotechnologyLearn more >⟨8⟩Materials and CommoditiesBuilding Materials • Construction and Mining Machinery • Agricultural Equipment • ChemicalsLearn more >⟨8⟩
## Take Your Strategic Sourcing to the Next Level
Discover the power of Mentum to streamline your sourcing process.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Mentum**

**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Batch:** Y Combinator Batch S21  
**Team:** 2 employees  

**Mission:** Mentum is on a quest to revolutionize procurement and strategic sourcing using artificial intelligence. The company aims to streamline processes for procurement and supply chain teams by turning unstructured data into actionable insights that drive faster decision-making and cost savings.

**Backing:** Mentum has garnered support from reputable investors, including Google’s Gradient Ventures and Y Combinator, which adds a strong validation to its business model.

**What They Do:**  
At its core, Mentum provides AI-powered solutions that automate sourcing tasks for complex projects, capital expenditures (CAPEX), and new product introductions, all directly from the user's email inbox. Here’s how they achieve that's:
- **Streamlining the Sourcing Process:** Their platform extracts and organizes supplier quotes, enabling side-by-side comparisons while managing complex communications across teams.
- **Advanced Features:** The tool creates Requests for Information (RFIs), Requests for Quotes (RFQs), and Requests for Proposals (RFPs) in minutes, reducing the manual effort involved in these tasks.
- **Smart Supplier Management:** It identifies potential suppliers using historical data and monitors communications to ensure accountability and traceability.

**Use Cases:** Mentum’s technology finds applicability across various industries including:
- Consumer Packaged Goods
- Energy
- Automotive
- Aerospace and Defense

**Security and Integration:**  
With a focus on enterprise-grade security, Mentum's integrations with popular platforms (like Office 365, Gmail, and various ERPs) are designed for ease of use, allowing quick connectivity without heavy IT overhead. They ensure compliance with stringent security standards, a must for industries like aerospace and defense.

**Why Mentum?**  
By leveraging AI, Mentum not only helps organizations increase visibility and efficiency within their supply chain but also allows procurement teams to focus on strategic initiatives rather than mundane tasks. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [getmentum.com](http://getmentum.com).
